<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Document</title>
    <style>
        .box{
            width: 100px;
            height: 100px;
            background-color: red;
            margin-bottom: 15px;
            position: static;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <h2>Static Position - Student in seats</h2>
    <div class="box">Student 1</div>

    <div class="box">Student 2</div>
    
    <div class="box">Student 3</div>

    <div style="height: 1000px;"></div>
</body>
</html>





<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Document</title>
    <style>
        .box{
            width: 100px;
            height: 100px;
            background-color: lightblue;
            margin: 10px;
            position: relative;
            left: 200px;
            top: 100px;
        }

        h2{
            position: relative;
            top: 70px;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <h2>Relative Position- </h2>

    <div class="box">Leaning student</div>
</body>
</html>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Document</title>
    <style>
        .header{
            background-color: coral;
            padding: 20px;
            position: sticky;
            top: 0;
           
        }

       
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <!-- Sticky = relative(Move) + fixed (cannot move)-->

    <h2>Sticky Position</h2>
    <div style="height: 150px; background-color: yellow;"></div>

    <div class="header">
        Sticky Student
    </div>

    <div id="Hello" style="height: 1500px; background-color: lightblue;">Scroll Down
         <h2>Hii I will Move from Above</h2>
    </div>
</body>
</html>





<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0">
    <title>Document</title>
    <style>
        img{
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            z-index: -1;
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <h1>Hello learner</h1>
    <img src="data:image/jpeg;base64,">
    <p>Beacse z index img has value -1</p>
</body>
</html>
